name: lichtara-research
description: Lichtara Research - Spiritual Technology and AI Integration Project

scripts.env:setup: cp .env.example .env && echo '✅ Environment file created. Please edit .env with your credentials.'
scripts.env:check: node -e "try { require('dotenv').config(); console.log('✅ Environment loaded successfully'); } catch(e) { console.error('❌ Error loading environment:', e.message); }"
scripts.env:prod: cp .env.production .env && echo '✅ Production environment template loaded'
scripts.help:
echo 'Available commands:
  npm run env:setup    - Create .env from template
  npm run env:validate - Validate environment variables
  npm run env:check    - Check if .env loads correctly
  npm run env:dev      - Load development environment
  npm run security:scan - Scan for potential security issues
  npm run docs:credentials - Show credential management guide'

author: Lichtara Research Team
